constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 59 (Thursday, April 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MACE:
H.R. 2327.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H1707]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the time period for eligibility under Survivors' And Dependents' Educational Assistance Program of Department of Veterans Affairs.
